description.name: Wide lance 5 holes for sprayers
description.long_desc:
Geko Wide 6-Nozzle Sprayer Lance


The Geko Wide 6-Nozzle Sprayer Lance is perfect for comprehensive plant care in gardens, orchards, or fields. Its versatility and customizable configuration make it an indispensable tool for every gardener or farmer.

With a maximum span of 168 cm, this lance ensures wide coverage during spraying, translating into efficiency and time savings. Its lightweight construction makes working with it comfortable and less tiring, even during prolonged use.

The assembly of the lance is incredibly simple and intuitive, allowing you to quickly and easily prepare it for work. Regardless of the application - whether for watering, applying plant protection products, or meticulous garden care - the Geko sprayer lance delivers excellent results with minimal effort.




  • Brand: Geko

  • Maximum Span: 168 cm

  • Number of Nozzles: 6

description.name: Battery sprayer 12L
description.long_desc:
12L Battery-Powered Sprayer is an indispensable tool for gardeners, farmers, and professionals involved in greenery maintenance. Thanks to the latest technologies and high-quality materials, this sprayer offers not only excellent performance but also user convenience and durability.


Powered by 35W, the sprayer is equipped with a 12V 8Ah battery, providing long-lasting operation without the need for frequent recharging. This allows the user to focus on their tasks without worrying about interruptions due to energy depletion. Additionally, the wide range of rotations (2800-3200/min) enables precise adjustment of the sprayer's operation to specific needs.


The 12-liter tank capacity is sufficient for longer work sessions, reducing the need for frequent refilling of spraying liquid. Furthermore, the adjustable flow rate, depending on the nozzle used (from 1.5 to 3 l/min), allows for adapting spraying to the task at hand, enhancing cost-effectiveness and efficiency.


The sprayer comes with 7 different nozzles for various applications, enabling a wide range of actions in the garden, orchard, or field. Their easy interchangeability allows the user to quickly adapt the sprayer to specific needs.


User comfort is ensured by the shoulder straps for carrying the sprayer on the back and the rear padding made of soft plastic, which cushions the back from excessive strain and discomfort.


The extended lance, with a length of 60 cm and extendable up to 100 cm, allows reaching difficult-to-access areas without excessive effort. The constant spraying lock function facilitates precise work in specific areas.


Two filters, with the larger one located directly at the tank inlet, provide protection against contaminants and extend the sprayer's durability.


Additional convenience and control over usage are provided by the battery charge indicator clock and the battery charger, which are included in the set.


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Geko

  • Power: 35W

  • Tank Capacity: 12 liters

  • Battery: 12V 8Ah

  • Engine Rotations: 2800-3200/min

  • Device Weight: 4.2 kg

  • Flow Rate Dependent on Nozzle: from 1.5 to 3 l/min

  • Nozzles: 7 different nozzles for various applications, easily interchangeable

  • Shoulder Straps: Comfortable shoulder straps for carrying the sprayer on the back, rear side of the sprayer covered with cushioning soft plastic protecting the back

  • Lance: Length 60 cm, extendable up to 100 cm, with a lock function for constant spraying

  • Filters: Two filters, with the larger one located directly at the tank inlet

  • Battery Charge Indicator Clock

  • Additional Equipment: Battery charger


Examples of Use:




  1. Spraying Garden Plants: Precise spraying of garden plants such as roses, hydrangeas, or ornamental shrubs to control pests such as aphids or spider mites. With various nozzles, it's possible to precisely adjust the spray to the specific needs of each plant.




  2. Protection of Orchards from Diseases: Applying plant protection products such as fungicides or insecticides in fruit orchards to prevent fungal diseases like powdery mildew or leaf blight. Spraying can be done using special tree nozzles.




  3. Watering Plants with Sprinklers: Using the sprayer to water plants with sprinklers in hard-to-reach areas of the garden or on irregular terrain, ensuring uniform moisture without the need for constant supervision.




  4. Weed Control on Lawns: Effective application of herbicides to control weeds on lawns, preventing their spread and maintaining the lawn in excellent condition. Different nozzles allow precise spraying even among dense grass.




  5. Maintenance of Fruit Trees and Shrubs: Spraying fruit trees and shrubs with nutrients such as fertilizers or micronutrient preparations to provide them with optimal growth and fruiting conditions. The long lance allows reaching the highest branches without using a ladder.




  6. Disinfection of Surfaces Around the House: Using the sprayer to disinfect surfaces around the house, such as cleaning the terrace or garden furniture, eliminating bacteria, viruses, and fungi, and ensuring hygiene and cleanliness.




  7. Protection of Plants from Pests: Applying insecticides to protect plants from pests such as aphids, spider mites, or crop pests. The variety of nozzles allows precise application of the product even in hard-to-reach places on plants.

description.name: Lance for sprayer brass telescopic 50-98cm
description.long_desc:
Enhance your work quality with the 50-98 cm brass telescopic lance for backpack sprayers. Perfectly designed to meet the needs of even the most demanding users, this lance combines durability, functionality, and versatility.


Key Features:




  • Solid Construction: Made from high-quality brass, it guarantees durability and corrosion resistance, ensuring long-lasting use in all conditions.




  • Telescopic Mechanism: The adjustable length of the lance allows for easy adaptation to various tasks. Its extendable design enables effective spraying even in hard-to-reach areas.




  • Compatibility: This lance is universal and fits most backpack sprayers, making it a versatile tool for both gardeners and professionals.




Applications:



  • Spraying garden plants and agricultural crops

  • Weed removal and pest control

  • Disinfection and cleaning of various surfaces

description.name: Wyściółki wkładki aluterma r.39 (10)
description.long_desc:
Wyściołki Aluterma to doskonałe rozwiązanie dla gumofilców, zapewniające skuteczną izolację termiczną. Wykonane z wysokiej jakości materiałów, zapewniających trwałość i odporność na warunki atmosferyczne. Idealne dopasowanie do gumofilców gwarantuje łatwą i szybką instalację, a także skuteczną ochronę przed utratą ciepła.

  • Rozmiar wkładki EU: 39
  • Długość wkładki: 25,7cm
  • Grubość wkładki: 5mm

Wyściołki Aluterma to doskonałe rozwiązanie dla gumofilców, zapewniające skuteczną izolację termiczną. description.name: Tile vibration tool with battery powered vacuum suction cup set
description.long_desc:
The Battery-powered Vibrating Suction Cup for tile laying is designed to transport tiles and vibrate the adhesive mass between the tile and the substrate to evenly distribute the adhesive and remove air bubbles. Using a vibrating suction cup prevents the formation of voids between the tile and the substrate, providing the most durable bonding of the tile to the substrate. The device has a knob for adjusting the vibration frequency.


Product characteristics:



  • Thanks to the generated vibrations, the device allows for excellent distribution of the adhesive and the removal of any air bubbles contained within it.

  • Using a vibrating suction cup reduces the potential risk of tile breakage caused by the presence of empty spaces between the tile and the substrate.

  • 6-step adjustment of vibration intensity

  • A sturdy suction cup with a diameter of 120mm

  • Suction cup lever lock

  • The set includes two 2000mAh batteries.


Technical specification:

Supply voltage18V
Number of batteries2
Battery capacity2000 mAh
Vibration frequency5000 - 12000 r/min
Suction cup diameter120mm
Suction cup lifting capacity50 kg
Maximum charging timemax 2 h
Charger supply voltage230 v / 50 Hz
description.short_desc:
The Battery-powered Vibrating Suction Cup for tile laying is designed to transport tiles and vibrate the adhesive mass between the tile and the substrate to evenly distribute the adhesive and remove air bubbles. Using a vibrating suction cup prevents the formation of voids between the tile and the substrate, providing the most durable bonding of the tile to the substrate. The device has a knob for adjusting the vibration frequency.

description.name: Dual action polisher 150mm GEKO PREMIUM + 4 sponges set
description.long_desc:
Electric Car Polisher is an advanced car care tool that combines performance with ease of use.


Equipped with a 720W nominal power electric motor, the polisher delivers excellent performance and long-lasting reliability. This makes it ideal for a wide range of applications, from headlight polishing to professional car detailing.


The polisher operates in Dual Action mode, which combines rotary and orbital motion. This combination ensures even and effective polishing, minimizing the risk of holograms and scratches.


150mm polishing disc allows for efficient and quick polishing of large surfaces.


Additionally, the polisher features a 7-speed adjustable rotary speed ranging from 2100 to 5000 RPM. This allows you to adjust the speed to different tasks and materials, providing greater control and precision.


Equipped with a practical continuous mode lock button, it allows for prolonged polishing without the need to constantly press the button, enhancing user comfort.


The set includes four Velcro-mounted polishing sponges of varying hardness and an Allen key. The sponges allow you to tailor the polishing process to different surfaces and levels of paint damage, and the Allen key makes it easy to change the polishing pad.


In summary, the Electric Car Polisher is a reliable, versatile, and easy-to-use tool that will surely meet the expectations of even the most demanding users.


Technical Specifications:





































Rated Voltage230 V
Nominal Power720 W
Operating Modedual action
Rotational Speed2100-5000 RPM
Speed Adjustment7-speed
Protection ClassII
Polishing Pad150 mm
Set Contents4 polishing sponges, spare carbon brushes, Allen key

Check out the product presentation on our YouTube channel:

description.name: White permanent oil marker
description.long_desc: Permanent white oil marker is a tool for marking tires. It provides durable and clear markings, which remain visible even after a long time. The marker can also be used to mark various surfaces, such as glass or plastic. Its power lies in excellent coverage, durability, and resistance to washing.

description.name: Lint roller 10cm 60 sheet
description.long_desc:
The clothing cleaning roller quickly deals with the problem of dirty trousers, a shirt covered in pet hair. This solution is faster, more convenient, and more effective than a vacuum cleaner: just swipe the roller over the dirty clothes a few times to see how easy it is now to remove many typical stains. When one sheet (10cm) is already completely covered with dirt, tear it off - underneath there are many more, completely clean sheets of which there are 60 in one refill.


Product characteristics:



  • This solution is faster, more convenient, and more effective than a vacuum cleaner: just swipe the roller several times over the dirty clothes.

  • When one sheet (10cm) is already completely covered with dirt, tear it off - underneath it there are many more, completely clean sheets of which there are 60 in one refill.

description.name: Gel cover for a bicycle saddle
description.long_desc:
The gel saddle cover is the ideal solution for all cycling enthusiasts.


Here's why you should choose our saddle cover:



  • Comfort and Protection: Our gel cover significantly increases comfort during rides. It reduces pressure on the pubic bone and sit bones, allowing for longer and more enjoyable rides.

  • Easy Installation: The inner non-slip surface and special drawstring to tighten under the saddle ensure secure and stable attachment of the cover.

  • Universal Size: Our cover fits most popular bicycle saddles.


Technical Specifications:


Material: GEL FOAM, polyester


Dimensions: 17x28cm

description.name: Inverted conical shank milling cutter 6mm (tungsten carbide 12x12mm)
description.long_desc:
High-quality rotary file made of tungsten carbide, characterized by very high hardness and resistance to wear.


Rotary files have become very popular in recent years, with wide applications in automotive, aviation, shipbuilding industries, and wherever quick removal of excess weld seams, castings formed during the casting process is necessary.


Indispensable for chamfering, removing burrs, and corrosion spots.


Characteristics:



  • file with a reverse cone geometry

  • made of high-quality tungsten carbide

  • very high hardness and resistance to wear, making it suitable for working with hardened steel


Technical specification:


Material: tungsten carbide


Geometry: reverse cone


Teeth: alternately slanted


Diameter of the working part: 12 mm


Length of the working part: 12 mm


Application:



  • Smoothing weld seams

  • Removing burrs

  • Breaking edges and leveling surfaces

  • Chamfering and removing corrosion

description.name: Bike handlebar extender
description.long_desc:
An extremely practical addition to your bicycle – an extra bike mount made from high-quality, durable aluminum ensures durability and reliability on any route. With it, your handlebar will gain extra space for mounting essential bike accessories.


Key features of the product:



  • Material: Solid aluminum that provides longevity and resistance to damage.

  • Versatility: The mount fits most bike handlebars with a diameter of 2 to 3.5 cm, making it a versatile solution for many bike models.

  • Multifunctionality: With the additional mount, you can easily install all necessary bike accessories in one place, such as a light, phone holder, bell, or bike computer.


The extra bike mount is the perfect solution for those who value order and functionality. Now all accessories will always be within reach, and you can enjoy a comfortable ride without unnecessary obstacles. Installation is simple and quick, and the result is extremely practical.

description.name: Thermal bicycle rack bag
description.long_desc:
We offer a practical and functional thermal pannier bag for bicycle racks by Keltin, which will become an indispensable companion for every cycling trip. The bag is designed with comfort, safety, and ease of use in mind.


Key features of the product:



  • Material: Made from durable polyester, ensuring resistance to abrasions and damage, providing long-lasting use.

  • Spaciousness: Equipped with two external pockets that allow quick access to the most needed items while riding.

  • Thermal Insulation: The main pocket is lined with thermal insulation material, making it perfect for carrying drinks and food, maintaining their temperature for a longer time.

  • Safety: Reflective elements increase the cyclist's visibility on the road, significantly enhancing safety when riding at dusk or in low visibility conditions.

  • Easy Installation: Attached using Velcro, allowing for quick and stable mounting on the bicycle rack.

  • Dimensions: The bag, measuring 38.5 x 16 x 15 cm, provides adequate capacity for storing essential accessories and provisions on the go.

  • Convenience: The set includes an additional shoulder strap, making it easy and hassle-free to carry the loaded bag.


The Keltin thermal pannier bag for bicycle racks is the ideal solution for any cyclist who values functionality and safety. It is perfect for both daily commutes to work and longer cycling trips. Choose convenience and practicality with the Keltin bag and enjoy every moment spent on your bike!
